title: NURS 344 Nursing Synthesis Project
description: Self-directed student project to synthesize and apply knowledge in a field of nursing practice under the guidance of a faculty mentor. Pass/Fail.
prerequisites: All of NURS 302, NURS 303, NURS 304, NURS 305, NURS 306, NURS 338, NURS 339, NURS 340.
